separator.desc: The character used to separate the breadcrumbs.

activeColor.desc: The color of the active breadcrumb, which can be any color from the Quasar Color Palette

gutter.desc: The gutter value allows you control over the space between the breadcrumb elements.

separatorColor.desc: The color used to color the separator.

align.desc: One of ‘left’, ‘right’, ‘center’, ‘between’ or ‘around’ and sets the alignment of the breadcrumbs.

separator.desc: HTML or component you can slot in to separate the breadcrumbs.
